landing.title: MONTILIVI INTERACTIVE TOUR
landing.p_1: Live an exciting experience for all the fans
landing.p_2: who want to feel Girona FC closer than ever before.

what_is.title: What is it?
what_is.p_1: Discover the Montilivi Stadium through a guided tour where you will get to know the most exclusive places of the stadium and learn about the great stories and historical moments of the club.
what_is.p_2: You will visit the press room, the home and away team changing rooms, the most exclusive areas of the stadium, including the presidential box... and you will have the opportunity to access the pitch through the player’s tunnel, where you can have your photo taken next to the pitch and the benches.

what_includes.title: What’s included?
what_includes.p_1: Visit Montilivi's most exclusive areas-5% discount in the official Girona FC shop-Exclusive souvenir bracelet
what_includes.p_2: Through the virtual reality glasses, you will be able to experience the atmosphere of a Girona FC matchday and you will feel how the players live the moments before a match with a full stadium.

itinerary.title: Itinerary
itinerary.item_8: IMPORTANT: From 23 June to 09 August the tour itinerary may be modified due to the refurbishment of the stadium for Champions League matches. Changing rooms temporarily unavailable and turf under renovation.

practical_info.title: Adittional information
practical_info.minors_2: Free admission for children under 4 years old.
practical_info.cancelation: Free cancellation up to 15 days in advance.
practical_info.groups_2: groups or companies, please fill in this

tickets.subtitle_1: Ask your questions or ask for more information
